participant_1.background:
My favorite thing to do is swim in the pool when my knee feels better.
I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
I'm a power plant operator.
I am a solitary introvert who gets along best with my pets.
I make enough money to support my family and pursue my hobbies.

participant_2.background:
I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work.
My worst nightmare is being fired from my internship.
I enjoy photography, especially of my cats and rainy scenes.
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
I dance to K-pop music to express myself.

content.text: Hi there! I'm in a wheelchair and I love to swim. What are your hobbies?
I enjoy photography, especially of my cats and rainy scenes. I also like to dance to K-pop music to express myself.
Wow, I love rainy scenes too! I'm also learning to swim. What's your favorite kind of dance?
I like to dance to K-pop music because it's upbeat and energetic. I also like to dance to hip hop music.
I've never heard of K-pop music before. I'll have to check it out!
You should! It's really good. I also like to dance to hip hop music.
I used to dance a lot when I was younger. I'm not very good at it anymore, but I still enjoy it.
That's great! I'm glad you still enjoy it.
Me too! It's a great way to express yourself.
I agree! It's also a great way to get exercise.
It sure is! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to connect with.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon.
